languages.text: "Если преподобный Адальберт и Иокаста свидетельствуют, что они чисты и покорны, я не буду запрещать их учение".
"Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
languages.original_text: "Если преподобный Адальберт и Иокаста свидетельствуют, что они чисты и покорны, я не буду запрещать их учение".

traits.locale_text: "Since Reverend Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
"Since Reverend Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
"Since Reverend Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
"Since Reverend Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
"Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
"Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."

languages.text: «Dado que el confesor Adalbert y la maestra Sauerback han afirmado que son obedientes y no suponen ningún problema, no prohibiré sus enseñanzas».
languages.original_text: "Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."

traits.locale_text: «Dado que el reverendo Adalbert y la señora Sauerback han afirmado que son obedientes y no suponen ningún problema, no prohibiré sus enseñanzas».

languages.text: 「聴罪師アダルバートとザウアーバック様は二人とも、あの人たちが従順で落ち度がないと証言しているのだから、彼らの教えを禁止しません」
languages.original_text: "Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."

traits.locale_text: 「アダルバート牧師とザウアーバック様は二人とも、あの人たちが従順で落ち度がないと証言しているのだから、彼らの教えを禁止しません」

languages.text: “既然告解神父阿达伯特和苏尔贝克女士都认为这些人很老实，没有犯下任何过错，那我不打算禁止他们的礼拜。”
languages.original_text: "Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."

traits.locale_text: “既然阿达伯特牧师和苏尔贝克女士都认为这些人很老实，没有犯下任何过错，那我不打算禁止他们的礼拜。”

languages.text: "Da sowohl Konfessor Adalbert als auch Meisterin Sauerback diese Leute für gehorsam und keiner Untaten schuldig erklärt haben, werde ich ihre Lehren nicht verbieten."
languages.original_text: "Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."

traits.locale_text: "Da sowohl Reverend Adalbert als auch Herrin Sauerback diese Leute für gehorsam und keiner Untaten schuldig erklärt haben, werde ich ihre Lehren nicht verbieten."

languages.text: « Puisque le confesseur Adalbert et maîtresse Sauerback se portent tous deux garants de l'obéissance et de l'innocence de ces gens, je n'interdirai pas leurs enseignements. »
languages.original_text: "Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque le révérend Adalbert et maîtresse Sauerback se portent tous deux garants de l'obéissance et de l'innocence de ces gens, je n'interdirai pas leurs enseignements. »

languages.text: "Hem Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert hem de Sauerback Hanım, bu şahısların itaatkâr ve kabahatsiz olduklarını ispat ettikleri için öğretilerini yasaklamayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Since Confessor Adalbert and Mistress Sauerback have both attested that those people are obedient and free of fault, I will not ban their teaching."
